description: The latest expansion for Rifts for Savage Worlds, Europa, takes players on a journey through a war-torn Europe where magic, monsters, and advanced technology collide. The setting explores a fractured continent, where kingdoms and communities strive to survive amidst monster-haunted wilderness. Powerful adversaries, including the Gargoyle Emperor Zerstrun, Pharaoh Rama-Set, the Russian Warlords, and the...
title: Rifts for Savage Worlds: Europa Now on Kickstarter – Explore a War-Torn, Magic-Fueled Continent

description: The Shin Megami Tensei franchise has expanded into the world of tabletop gaming with the release of Shin Megami Tensei – The Roleplaying Game: Tokyo Conception. LionWing Publishing, in partnership with ATLUS, has launched a professionally localized digital edition of the game, with pre-orders now open for an upcoming physical release. Fans who pre-order the...
title: Shin Megami Tensei – The Roleplaying Game: Tokyo Conception Digital Edition Now Available

description: The clock is ticking, with less than a week left to support Tales of the Kytin Age, the tabletop RPG set in a post-apocalyptic future where giant insects roam the land. The Kickstarter campaign, which ends on November 24th, has hit its funding goal, but there’s still time to back this unique project and be...
title: Less Than a Week Left to Back Tales of the Kytin Age, a New TTRPG Set in a World Dominated by Great Insects
